Should you choose to proceed, I assure you of a seamless and personalized service tailored to your needs. Looking forward to your positive response. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $7,500.

(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $7,500
(2) Reject Alice's offer
